name: L-threonylcarbamoyladenylate:adenine in tRNA N6-L-threonylcarbamoyltransferase
definition: L-Threonylcarbamoyladenylate + tRNA adenine <=> AMP + N6-L-Threonylcarbamoyladenine in tRNA

orthologs.K15904: bifunctional N6-L-threonylcarbamoyladenine synthase / protein kinase Bud32 [EC:2.3.1.234 2.7.11.1]
